introduction: Hello, this is unrehab, the ultimate rehabilitation platform for stroke patients.
controls: This virtual avatar will move itself emulating your movements like if you were in a mirror.
trigger_explanation: This capsules act like buttons, just touch them and let the timer reach 5 seconds in order to trigger them. Have a try!
congratulations: Congratulations! You may find triggers like this in some of the games.
final_message: You will be soon sent to the main menu, please enjoy your stay. :D
